lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Jim Beanz
[00:01.00] 作词 : Craig David
[00:15.800]Never thought that I'd fall in love, love, love, love
[00:19.640]But it grew from a simple crush, crush, crush, crush
[00:23.210]Being without you girl, I was all messed up, up, up, up
[00:26.900]When you walked out, said that you'd had enough-nough-nough-nough
[00:30.000]
[00:30.010]Been a fool, girl I know
[00:33.600]Didn't expect this is how things would go
[00:37.510]Maybe in time, you'll change your mind
[00:41.200]Now looking back i wish i could rewind
[00:44.990]
[00:45.220]Because i can't sleep til you're next to me
[00:49.100]No i can't live without you no more
[00:52.700]Oh i stay up til you're next to me
[00:56.780]Til this house feels like it did before
[00:59.820]
[01:00.010]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[01:04.000]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[01:07.820]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[01:11.590]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[01:14.960]
[01:16.280]Remember telling my boys that I'd never fall in love, love, love, love
[01:20.350]You used to think I'd never find a girl I could trust, trust, trust, trust
[01:24.180]And then you walked into my life and it was all about us, us, us, us
[01:27.890]But now I'm sitting here thinking I messed the whole thing up, up, up, up
[01:31.280]
[01:31.290]Been a fool （fool）, girl I know （know）
[01:34.920]Didn't expect this is how things would go
[01:38.660]Maybe in time （time）, you'll change your mind （mind）
[01:42.440]Now looking back i wish i could rewind
[01:46.370]
[01:46.550]Because i can't sleep til you're next to me
[01:50.450]No i can't live without you no more （without you no more）
[01:54.020]Oh i stay up til you're next to me （to me）
[01:58.140]Til this house feels like it did before （Because it）
[02:00.860]
[02:01.710]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:05.150]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:09.020]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:12.760]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:16.810]
[02:17.680]Ah, i just can't go to sleep
[02:23.230]Cause it feels like I've fallen for you
[02:26.810]It's getting way too deep
[02:30.860]And i know that it's love because
[02:33.300]
[02:33.510]I can't sleep til you're next to me
[02:36.710]No i can't live without you no more （without you no more）
[02:40.390]Oh i stay up til you're next to me （to me）
[02:44.310]Til this house feels like it did before
[02:47.410]
[02:47.820]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:51.190]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:55.390]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[02:58.950]Feels like insomnia ah ah
[03:01.910]
[03:02.880]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[03:06.540]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[03:10.590]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[03:14.220]Feels like insomnia ah ah,
[03:19.110]
tlyric:
[by:夜尽天明mcs]
[00:15.800]从没想过我会陷入爱、爱、爱、爱中
[00:19.640]这份爱诞生于一份单纯的迷恋、恋、恋 、恋
[00:23.210]没有你的日子，女孩，我真是糟、糟、糟、糟了
[00:26.900]当你离开了我，说你受够、够、够、够了
[00:30.010]我以前是个傻瓜，女孩，我现在知道了
[00:33.600]我并没有预期事情会变得这样子
[00:37.510]或者到时你会改变想法
[00:41.200]现在回首往事我希望我可以倒带
[00:45.220]因为只有你在我身旁我才能睡得着
[00:49.100]不，没有你我活不下去
[00:52.700]噢，我熬夜直到你再次出现在我身旁
[00:56.780]直到这房子又感觉回到从前
[01:00.010]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[01:04.000]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[01:07.820]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[01:11.590]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[01:16.280]我还记得跟哥儿们说我永远都不会陷入爱、爱、爱、爱中
[01:20.350]你曾经也总以为我永远找不到一个女孩我可以信、信、信、信任
[01:24.180]然后你就走进了我的生命，全都是我们、们、们、们的故事
[01:27.890]但现在我就坐在这里想着我把这一切都搞乱、乱、乱、乱了  
[01:31.290]我以前是个傻瓜，女孩，我现在知道了
[01:34.920]我并没有预期事情会变得这样子
[01:38.660]或者到时你会改变想法
[01:42.440]现在回首往事我希望我可以倒带 
[01:46.550]因为只有你在我身旁我才能睡得着
[01:50.450]不，没有你我活不下去 （没有你）
[01:54.020]噢，我熬夜直到你再次出现在我身旁 （在我身旁）
[01:58.140]直到这房子又感觉回到从前
[02:01.710]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:05.150]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:09.020]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:12.760]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:17.680]啊，我就是睡不着
[02:23.230]因为感觉我已经深迷于你
[02:26.810]陷得太深，无法自拔
[02:30.860]但我知道这是爱，因为
[02:33.510]我睡不着直到你再次出现在我身旁 
[02:36.710]不，没有你我活不下去 （没有你）
[02:40.390]噢，我熬夜直到你再次出现在我身旁 （在我身旁）
[02:44.310]直到这房子又感觉回到从前
[02:47.820]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:51.190]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:55.390]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[02:58.950]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[03:02.880]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[03:06.540]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[03:10.590]感觉就像失眠，ah~
[03:14.220]感觉就像失眠，ah~
